name: craigslist_search_jobs
description: Search Craigslist job listings in a specific city. Returns jobs with title, location, date, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.cl-search-result, .result-row, .cl-static-search-result').forEach((el,i) => { if(i>=15) return; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.posting-title, a.result-title, a.cl-app-anchor'); const locEl = el.querySelector('.result-hood, .meta'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, .result-date'); results.push({ title: titleEl?titleEl.textContent.trim():'', url: titleEl?titleEl.href:'', location: locEl?locEl.textContent.trim():'', date: dateEl?dateEl.textContent.trim():'' }); }); return { city: '{{city}}', query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results }
